explains: n. 银行家，银行要员；庄家；稳赢的赌注；捕鳕渔船；水涨齐岸的河流；辅动机车

sentences.en: It made sense to appoint a banker to this job.
sentences.cn: 任命一位银行家做这项工作是合理的。

sentences.en: The banker chuckled and said, "Of course not."
sentences.cn: 银行家轻声笑了，说道，“当然不。”

sentences.en: Yvonne guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker.
sentences.cn: 伊冯娜猜测他是一位非常成功的出版商或银行家。
